summary: Explore genes and genetic mutations using chromosome view. Zoom to see associated genes, or delve into edges, to link patient populations
desc: Chromosome Ensemble Genes 91 – Human Genes GRCH38 and GRCH19

citations.name: Scientific Publications, Citing Ensembl Data
citations.desc: Since release 25, all Ensembl releases have been archived as fully functional sites for about three years. This makes it possible to accurately cite data being referred to in a paper, even though the main Ensembl site is being continuously updated (currently release 91 - December 2017).
